alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:21AM EST until February 23 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FREEZING RAIN AND FREEZING DRIZZLE THIS AFTERNOON INTO THIS EVENING... .Patchy freezing drizzle early this afternoon will give way to more consistent freezing rain later in the day. Some sleet and snow may also mix in early before a regionwide change to rain during the evening. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of south central, southwest, west central, and western Maine. Portions of central and northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to ice and snow. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
